sed_intended_user_description: Here is the list of intended users of the HIT module. Healthcare Providers: EHR Modules: These are used by healthcare providers such as physicians, nurses, and other clinical staff to record and manage patient health information. Health IT Administrators: HIE Modules: Managed by administrators responsible for sharing patient data between different healthcare organizations and systems. Patients: Patient Portals: Designed for patients to access their own health records, communicate with healthcare providers and schedule appointments. Healthcare Payers: Claims Processing Modules: Used by insurance companies and payers to process and manage healthcare claims. Pharmacists: Pharmacy Information Systems: Help pharmacists manage medication dispensing, drug interactions, and patient medication history. Public Health Officials: Public Health Reporting Modules: Enable public health agencies to collect and analyze health data for disease surveillance and reporting.
